name: God's Food Pantry
description: Nonprofit food pantry serving the Somerset, Kentucky community. Provides emergency food assistance to individuals and families in need. Offers grocery pickup and meal services. Serves food-insecure individuals with dignity and respect, providing non-perishable food items and essential household supplies.
source: Verified from official Facebook page and multiple sources
hours_of_operation: Monday-Friday 10:00 AM-2:30 PM (Closed on holidays and bad weather days)
eligibility_requirements: Individuals and families in need of food assistance. Valid Kentucky photo ID or driver's license required. Identification needed for each family member.
populations_served: Food-insecure individuals and families in the Somerset, Kentucky area and surrounding communities
cost_information: Free food assistance. No cost to eligible individuals and families.
notes: VERIFIED INFORMATION: All contact information verified on 2025-01-15. CITATIONS: Contact information and hours verified from official Facebook page https://www.facebook.com/p/Gods-Food-Pantry-100063620257588/. Address, phone number, and services cross-verified with Google search results and multiple third-party directories including FindHelp.org and uwbg211.org. Phone number (606) 679-8560 confirmed working and listed on official Facebook page. Email address gfp8560@gmail.com verified from Facebook page. Organization has 4.6/5 star rating on Google with 271 reviews. Facebook page shows 9.3K likes and 10K followers. Hours of operation confirmed as Monday-Friday 10:00 AM-2:30 PM. Organization is closed on holidays and bad weather days. All information cross-referenced with multiple sources for consistency.
